name: Track call with Ecom events (Checkout Started) with enabled flattenProperties
fullName: test/integrations/component.test.ts#/home/runner/work/rudder-transformer/rudder-transformer/test/integrations/destinations/klaviyo/processor/data.ts Tests klaviyo destination processor -> Track call with Ecom events (Checkout Started) with enabled flattenProperties (index: 28)
description:
Feature: processor
      Description: Track call with Ecom events (Checkout Started) with enabled flattenProperties

      Scenario: Business
      Test ID: klaviyo-ecom-test-2
      API Version: v0
